Text: lunch changeI just found out I am going to be out of town WedFrid so I wont be available for lunch on Wed Can we reschedule for next Tues or Wed Sorry but duty calls Thanks Niko Nickolas J Lorentzatos Attorney Litigation Burlington Resources Inc fax
